author: Patanjali
text: Yoga is the journey of the self, through the self, to the self.

author: B.K.S. Iyengar
text: Yoga is a light, which once lit, will never dim. The better your practice, the brighter the flame.

author: Sri Aurobindo
text: True knowledge is not attained by thinking. It is what you are; it is what you become.

author: T.K.V. Desikachar
text: The success of yoga does not lie in the ability to perform postures but in how it positively changes the way we live our life and our relationships.

author: Thich Nhat Hanh
text: Feelings come and go like clouds in a windy sky. Conscious breathing is my anchor.

author: Paramahansa Yogananda
text: You do not have to struggle to reach God, but you do have to struggle to tear away the self-created veil that hides him from you.

author: Ram Dass
text: We’re all just walking each other home.

author: Sadhguru
text: Yoga is not about touching your toes. It’s about what you learn on the way down.

author: Swami Sivananda
text: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.

author: Krishna
text: A person can rise through the efforts of his own mind; or draw himself down, in the same manner. Because each person is his own friend or enemy.

author: Eckhart Tolle
text: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you ever have. Make the Now the primary focus of your life.

author: Rumi
text: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.

author: The Bhagavad Gita
text: Yoga is the practice of tolerating the consequences of being yourself.

author: Ramana Maharshi
text: Your own Self-realization is the greatest service you can render the world.

author: Lao Tzu
text: Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom.

author: Swami Vivekananda
text: You cannot believe in God until you believe in yourself.

author: Osho
text: Be — don't try to become.

author: Mooji
text: Feelings are just visitors. Let them come and go.

author: Nisargadatta Maharaj
text: Wisdom tells me I am nothing. Love tells me I am everything. And between the two my life flows.

author: Buddha
text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
